sn22.50:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn22.50:1.3: Atha kho sono gahapatiputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho sonam gahapatiputtam bhagava etadavoca:
sn22.50:2.1: “Ye hi keci, sona, samana va brahmana va rupam nappajananti, rupasamudayam nappajananti, rupanirodham nappajananti, rupanirodhagaminim patipadam nappajananti;
sn22.50:2.2: vedanam nappajananti, vedanasamudayam nappajananti, vedananirodham nappajananti, vedananirodhagaminim patipadam nappajananti;
sn22.50:2.4: sankhare nappajananti, sankharasamudayam nappajananti, sankharanirodham nappajananti, sankharanirodhagaminim patipadam nappajananti;
sn22.50:2.5: vinnanam nappajananti, vinnanasamudayam nappajananti, vinnananirodham nappajananti, vinnananirodhagaminim patipadam nappajananti.
sn22.50:2.6: Na me te, sona, samana va brahmana va samanesu va samanasammata brahmanesu va brahmanasammata, na ca pana te ayasmanto samannattham va brahmannattham va dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharanti.
sn22.50:3.1: Ye ca kho keci, sona, samana va brahmana va rupam pajananti, rupasamudayam pajananti, rupanirodham pajananti, rupanirodhagaminim patipadam pajananti;
sn22.50:3.5: vinnanam pajananti, vinnanasamudayam pajananti, vinnananirodham pajananti, vinnananirodhagaminim patipadam pajananti.
sn22.50:3.6: Te ca kho me, sona, samana va brahmana va samanesu ceva samanasammata brahmanesu ca brahmanasammata, te ca panayasmanto samannatthanca brahmannatthanca dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharanti”ti.
